error.unexpected: May naganap na hindi inaasahang error.
error.unexpectedRemove: May naganap na hindi inaasahang error habang tinatanggal ang key.
error.unexpectedSave: May naganap na hindi inaasahang error habang sine-save.
error.unexpectedLoad: May naganap na hindi inaasahang error habang naglo-load.
error.invalidRenderOptions: Hindi wastong render options ang binigay
error.failedToLoadSRT: Nabigo ang pag-load ng SRT file

common.confirmReload: Sigurado ka bang gusto mong i-reload ang page? Maaaring mawala ang anumang hindi na-save na pagbabago.

input.localFileDescription: Upload a video or audio file from your computer
input.webDescription: Paste YouTube, TikTok, Instagram video links, or direct video file URLs from web pages
input.featuresUnlockAfterTranscription: Translation and other menus will appear after transcription completes.
input.cookieHelp: Tip: Be signed into YouTube in the selected browser. If you see a consent screen, visit youtube.com once in that browser and accept, then retry here.
input.cookieAdvice: Make sure the selected browser is the one you're logged into YouTube on.

subtitles.cancel_confirmation: Sigurado ka bang gusto mong kanselahin ang proseso ng pagsasalin ng subtitle? Mawawala ang anumang progress at kailangan mong magsimula ulit.

item.seekTitle: Hanapin ang video sa oras ng pagsisimula
item.insertTitle: Maglagay ng bagong subtitle block pagkatapos nito
item.removeTitle: Alisin ang subtitle block na ito
item.shiftTitle: I-shift ang subtitle na ito ng ilang segundo (+/-)
item.confirmRemove: Sigurado ka bang gusto mong alisin ang subtitle block na ito? Hindi na maaaring bawiin ang aksyon na ito.

header.saveTooltip: I-save ang mga pagbabago sa orihinal na file
header.saveAsTooltip: I-save Bilang muna para paganahin ang direktang pag-save

settings.title: Mga Setting
settings.creditsDescription: Bumili ng credits. Ang ipinapakitang oras ay tantiya ng kabuuang haba ng video na maaari mong i-transcribe o isalin. Halimbawa: ang pag-transcribe at pagsasalin ng 3-oras na video ay gagamit ng humigit‑kumulang 6 na oras (≈140,000 credits).

qualityTranscription.label: Quality Transcription
qualityTranscription.help: On: sequential, uses prior-line context. Off: faster batched mode.

qualityTranslation.label: Quality Translation
qualityTranslation.help: On: may kasamang yugto ng rebisyon (gagamit ng humigit-kumulang 5× higit pang credits/oras). Off: laktawan ang rebisyon.

dubbing.voiceHelp: Choose the default voice used when generating dubbed audio.
dubbing.mixLabel: Dubbing Volume vs Original Video Volume
dubbing.mixHelp: Control how much of the original soundtrack plays underneath the dubbed voice.

byoOpenAi.title: Bring Your Own OpenAI Key
byoOpenAi.description: Unlock a one-time upgrade to use your own OpenAI API key. Once unlocked, any transcription, translation, dubbing, or summary runs directly on your account instead of consuming Stage5 credits.
byoOpenAi.unlockHint: Once unlocked, add your OpenAI key here at any time to toggle direct billing on your account.
byoOpenAi.unlockedDescription: Enter your OpenAI API key below. All eligible AI requests will run directly against your OpenAI account when a key is present.
byoOpenAi.toggleHelp: When off, AI Credits are used.
byoOpenAi.toggleOn: Using your OpenAI key for AI tasks.
byoOpenAi.toggleOff: Using Stage5 credits for AI tasks.

creditWarning.message: Bumili ng mga credit sa <settingsLink>{{settingsLinkText}}</settingsLink> para gamitin ang mga feature ng translation at transcription.

validation.processingDuration: Pinoproseso ang duration ng video. Subukan ulit mamaya.
validation.icloudPlaceholder: This file is stored in iCloud. In Finder, click “Download” and wait for the cloud icon to finish, then try again.

dialogs.saveDownloadedVideoAs: I-save ang Na-download na Video Bilang
dialogs.cancelTranslationConfirm: Kanselahin ang translation? Mawawala ang progress at kailangan mong magsimula ulit.

slowProcessingBanner.title: Mas matagal kaysa sa karaniwan ang processing.
slowProcessingBanner.description: Maaaring dahil sa mataas na demand o may problema sa mga server ng OpenAI. Patuloy pa ring tumatakbo ang proseso sa background.

dialogs.cancelDownloadConfirm: Cancel download? Progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.

slowDownloadBanner.title: Download is taking longer than usual.
slowDownloadBanner.description: This may be due to video platform changes or new protection measures. You may need to wait for the next app version to handle newer videos.

unsavedSrtOnTranscribe.title: I-save ang kasalukuyang subtitles bago mag-transcribe?
unsavedSrtOnTranscribe.message: May naka-load ka nang mga subtitle. Papalitan ang mga ito kapag nag-transcribe. Ano ang gusto mong gawin?

dialogs.cancelDubbingConfirm: Cancel dubbing? Progress will be lost and you'll need to start again.

creditRanOut.title: Credits ran out
creditRanOut.message: Your AI credits have run out. Recharge in Settings, then resume where you left off.

credits.title: Mga Oras ng Paggamit ng AI
credits.description: Pumili mula sa ${{pack1Price}} ({{pack1Hours}} oras), ${{pack2Price}} ({{pack2Hours}} oras), o ${{pack3Price}} ({{pack3Hours}} oras) na credit packs
credits.notEnough: Hindi sapat ang mga credit. Mangyaring bumili pa ng mga credit para magpatuloy.

errors.needCookies: YouTube asked for a human check. Retry using your browser cookies.
errors.unexpectedRemove: An unexpected error occurred while removing the key.
errors.unexpectedSave: An unexpected error occurred while saving.
errors.unexpectedLoad: An unexpected error occurred while loading.

summary.title: Transcript Summary
summary.ctaHelper: Generate an in-depth overview. Long videos may take a moment to process.
summary.placeholder: Your AI summary will appear here once generated.
summary.insufficientCredits: Not enough credits to run the summary.
summary.noHighlights: No highlights yet. Generate to detect punchlines.
summary.noVideoForHighlights: Open the source video to cut highlight clips.

logs.title: Recent Logs
logs.emailBodyPrefix:
Hi,

Please find my recent logs below to help debug the issue.
